{"id":1520586291,"question_id":3704,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 5 days","timestamp":1737858952,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1520586291/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Partitions with Even Sum Difference","memory":"23.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int countPartitions(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int n = nums.size();\n        vector<int> preSum(n, 0);\n        preSum[0] = nums[0];\n        for(int i=1; i<n; i++) {\n            preSum[i] = preSum[i-1]+nums[i];\n        };\n        int ret = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<n-1; i++) {\n            int left = preSum[i];\n            int right = preSum[n-1]-preSum[i];\n            if(left%2==right%2)\n                ret++;\n        };\n        return ret;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-partitions-with-even-sum-difference","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
